file.name: DemoAPI.json
file.content: {"openapi":"3.0.1","info":{"title":"Demo API","version":"1.0.0-SNAPSHOT"},"servers":[{"description":"Generated server url","url":"http://localhost:8080"}],"paths":{"/api/data/all-data":{"get":{"operationId":"getAllData","responses":{"200":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"$ref":"#/components/schemas/Data"}}}},"description":"OK"}},"tags":["Data"]}},"/api/data/data":{"get":{"operationId":"getData","responses":{"200":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"$ref":"#/components/schemas/Data"}}},"description":"OK"}},"tags":["Data"]}},"/api/data/validate":{"post":{"description":"Validate the data","operationId":"validate","requestBody":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"$ref":"#/components/schemas/Data"}}},"description":"The data to validate","required":true},"responses":{"204":{"description":"The data was validated successfully"},"400":{"content":{"application/problem+json":{"schema":{"$ref":"#/components/schemas/ProblemDetails"}}},"description":"Invalid argument"},"403":{"content":{"application/problem+json":{"schema":{"$ref":"#/components/schemas/ProblemDetails"}}},"description":"Access denied"},"500":{"content":{"application/problem+json":{"schema":{"$ref":"#/components/schemas/ProblemDetails"}}},"description":"An error has occurred and the request could not be processed at this time"}},"summary":"Validate the data","tags":["Data"]}},"/api/test/test-exception-handling":{"get":{"operationId":"testExceptionHandling","responses":{"200":{"description":"OK"}},"tags":["Test"]}},"/api/test/test-local-date-time":{"get":{"description":"Test the local date time serialization","operationId":"testLocalDateTime","parameters":[{"description":"The local date time","in":"query","name":"localDateTime","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"}}],"responses":{"200":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"}}},"description":"OK"}},"summary":"Test the local date time serialization","tags":["Test"]}},"/api/test/test-web-client":{"get":{"operationId":"testWebClient","responses":{"200":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"$ref":"#/components/schemas/AuthenticationResponse"}}},"description":"OK"}},"tags":["Test"]}},"/api/test/test-zoned-date-time":{"get":{"description":"Test the zoned date time serialization","operationId":"testZonedDateTime","parameters":[{"description":"The zoned date time","in":"query","name":"zonedDateTime","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"}}],"responses":{"200":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"}}},"description":"OK"}},"summary":"Test the zoned date time serialization","tags":["Test"]}}},"components":{"schemas":{"AuthenticationResponse":{"type":"object","properties":{"expiresInMinutes":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"schema":{"type":"string"},"token":{"type":"string"}},"required":["expiresInMinutes","schema","token"]},"Data":{"type":"object","description":"Data","properties":{"dateValue":{"type":"string","description":"The date value for the data","format":"date","xml":{"name":"DateValue"}},"id":{"type":"integer","description":"The ID for the data","format":"int64","xml":{"name":"Id"}},"integerValue":{"type":"integer","description":"The integer value for the data","format":"int32","xml":{"name":"IntegerValue"}},"stringValue":{"maxLength":4000,"minLength":1,"type":"string","description":"The string string value for the data","xml":{"name":"StringValue"}},"timestampValue":{"type":"string","description":"The timestamp value for the data","format":"date-time","xml":{"name":"TimestampValue"}}},"required":["dateValue","id","integerValue","stringValue","timestampValue"],"xml":{"name":"Data","namespace":"http://demo"}},"ProblemDetails":{"type":"object","description":"A problem details object, as defined by RFC 7807, which holds the information for an error returned by an API","properties":{"detail":{"type":"string","description":"The human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem"},"parameter":{"type":"string","description":"The optional name of the parameter associated with the problem"},"stackTrace":{"type":"string","description":"The optional stack trace generated by the origin server for the problem"},"status":{"type":"integer","description":"The HTTP status code generated by the origin server for this occurrence of the problem","format":"int32"},"timestamp":{"type":"string","description":"The date and time the problem occurred","format":"date-time","xml":{"name":"Timestamp"}},"title":{"type":"string","description":"The short, human-readable summary of the problem type; it should not change from occurrence to occurrence of the problem, except for purposes of localization","xml":{"name":"Title"}},"type":{"type":"string","description":"The URI reference that identifies the problem type","xml":{"name":"Type"}},"validationErrors":{"type":"array","description":"The optional validation errors associated with the problem","items":{"$ref":"#/components/schemas/ValidationError"}}},"required":["detail","status","timestamp","title","type"]},"ValidationError":{"type":"object","description":"A validation error","properties":{"attributes":{"type":"array","description":"The attributes associated with the validation error","xml":{"name":"Attributes"},"items":{"$ref":"#/components/schemas/ValidationErrorAttribute"}},"message":{"type":"string","description":"The error message for the validation error","xml":{"name":"Message"}},"property":{"type":"string","description":"The path for the property that resulted in the validation error","xml":{"name":"Property"}}},"required":["attributes","message","property"],"xml":{"name":"ValidationError","namespace":"http://inception.digital/core"}},"ValidationErrorAttribute":{"type":"object","description":"An attribute associated with a validation error","properties":{"name":{"type":"string","xml":{"name":"Name"}},"value":{"type":"string","xml":{"name":"Value"}}},"required":["name"],"xml":{"name":"ValidationErrorAttribute","namespace":"http://inception.digital/core"}}}}}
